pages.text: Node Overclockers are a more complex component.$(br2)Each $(l:laserio:laser_node)Node$(/l) can only operate on 1 card per side per tick. $(br2)If there are 3 extractor cards in the side of a node, only the first one will operate during a game tick, and the second will only operate if the first fails to do anything.

pages.title: No Node Overclockers
pages.text: There are zero Node Overclockers installed

Each Node Overclocker installed on the side of a Node allows that side to operate on more cards per tick. A total of 8 Node Overclockers can be installed, allowing all 9 nodes to be operated on. $(br2)Inserter cards do $(l)$(#ff0000)NOT$() need overclockers to function, $(l)ONLY$() Extractor and Stocker cards need them.

pages.title: 2 Node Overclockers
pages.text: There are two Node Overclockers installed
